message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "Using the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys data, we analyze the impact of corruption on firm performance in Sub-Saharan African countries.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys"], "topic": ["Governance"]}, {"sentence": "In this study, we utilize a unique dataset that combines historical aerial photographs and modern satellite imagery to examine land use changes over time in the Amazon rainforest.", "dataset": ["historical aerial photographs", "modern satellite imagery"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "To understand the relationship between air quality and health outcomes, we use daily pollution data from the Global Historical Climatology Network and individual-level health records from the National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey.", "dataset": ["Global Historical Climatology Network", "National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey"], "topic": ["Health", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We investigate the determinants of remittances using panel data from the World Bank's Migration and Remittances dataset for Latin American and Caribbean countries.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Migration and Remittances dataset"], "topic": ["Migration"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses two datasets: the 2015 Integrated Household Living Conditions Survey and the Madagascar Poverty Mapping project, to explore the relationship between poverty and natural disasters in Madagascar.", "dataset": ["2015 Integrated Household Living Conditions Survey", "Madagascar Poverty Mapping project"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "We employ a large dataset of job postings from the Chinese online recruitment website Zhilian to analyze the gender wage gap across various industries in China.", "dataset": ["Chinese online recruitment website Zhilian"], "topic": ["Gender", "Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "To examine the effect of infrastructure investment on local economic development, we combine data on public spending on infrastructure from the World Bank's Public Investment Management dataset with nighttime lights data from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Public Investment Management dataset", "National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration"], "topic": ["Infrastructure"]}, {"sentence": "In this study, we use a dataset of satellite imagery and meteorological data provided by the European Space Agency to explore the relationship between deforestation and climate change in the Amazon rainforest.", "dataset": ["European Space Agency"], "topic": ["Environment", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We examine the impact of government policies on financial sector development using panel data from the Financial Development and Structure database for African countries.", "dataset": ["Financial Development and Structure database"], "topic": ["Financial Sector", "Governance"]}, {"sentence": "To investigate the relationship between access to credit and firm performance, we use firm-level data from the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys and individual credit information from the Credit Bureau of Cambodia.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys", "Credit Bureau of Cambodia"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}]
